original_solution_mapping.L1: Cary needs to save an additional $120 - $30 = $<<120-30=90>>90.
original_solution_mapping.L3: It will take 90 / 15 = <<90/15=6>>6 more weekends to save enough money to afford the shoes.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 6101.
    Returns: the number of additional weekends Cary needs to mow lawns.
    """
    # L1
    shoe_cost = 120 # shoes that cost $120
    already_saved = 30 # He has already saved $30
    money_needed = shoe_cost - already_saved

    # L2
    earnings_per_lawn = 5 # He earns $5 for every lawn he mows
    lawns_per_weekend = 3 # mows 3 lawns each weekend
    earnings_per_weekend = earnings_per_lawn * lawns_per_weekend

    # L3
    weekends_needed = money_needed / earnings_per_weekend

    # FA
    answer = weekends_needed
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: Cary needs to save an additional ${shoe_cost} - ${already_saved} = $<<{shoe_cost}-{already_saved}={money_needed}>>{money_needed}.
It will take {money_needed} / {earnings_per_weekend} = <<{money_needed}/{earnings_per_weekend}={weekends_needed}>>{weekends_needed} more weekends to save enough money to afford the shoes.

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: Cary needs to save an additional $120 - $30 = $<<120-30=150>>150.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L3: It will take 150 / 15 = <<150/15=10>>10 more weekends to save enough money to afford the shoes.

explanation: Incorrect operation. The calculation should use '-' but used '+' instead.
